title: Moon in Virgo
summary: A practical emotional climate that focuses on details and service. Feelings express through fixing, organizing, and making systems kinder and cleaner.

meaning.headline: Emotions lean analytical, precise, and eager to improve things.

frames.text: With the Moon in Virgo, moods notice small glitches and want to resolve them.
Care shows up through useful actions and practical support.
Tidying or organizing can soothe worries.
Feedback lands best when it is kind and actionable.
Perfection is required to feel okay.

frictions: Difficulty resting until everything feels tidy
opportunities: Clearing inboxes, surfaces, or to-do lists
Breaking down a complex job into steps

do: Pick one area to declutter or optimize.
Translate worries into a simple checklist.
Offer specific, kind feedback where useful.
Make time for body care between tasks.
avoid: Trying to perfect everything at once
Skipping meals or breaks while troubleshooting
Expecting others to match your standards instantly

reusable_lines.text: The mood is practical and ready to tidy loose ends today.
Small, caring fixes bring calm under this sky.

forbidden_claims: Deterministic claims about anxiety or perfectionism
allowed_framing: Environmental focus on refinement and service
Agency-based choices about pacing and standards

sources: Moon in Virgo as short-term climate of refinement
